輤字的基本解释

輤
qiàn
古代载柩车上用作装饰的覆盖物。
载柩车。

輤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiàn］
［《廣韻》倉甸切，去霰，清。］
(1)古代覆盖在丧车上的饰物。
(2)载柩车。亦代指灵柩。

輤字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輤； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1245第10
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?倉甸切，音倩。【廣韻】載柩車蓋。【禮·雜記】諸侯之輤有裧，大夫以布，士以葦席。【註】輤，載柩將殯車飾也。殯謂之輤，葬謂之柳。　【玉篇】或作倩。【集韻】通作?。

輤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
輤字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Large
qiàn
Used as a decorative covering on ancient pickup trucks.
Hearing car.
Large
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiàn］
["Guangyun" Cangdian cut, go to hail, clear. ]
(1) Ancient ornaments covering the funeral car.
(2) Hearing car. Also refers to the coffin.
Large
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輤; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1245 No. 10
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Cangdian cut, Yinqian. [Guangyun] The cover of the car. 【Ritual·Miscellaneous Notes】The princes are very rich, doctors use cloth and scholars use reed seats. [Note] Chung, the funeral decoration is also carried by the pike. Funeral is called hunger, and burial is called willow.　【Jade articles】or Zuoqian. 【Jiyun】Common for?.
